div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 259 Epirus, before 1961 Burial: after 148 B.C. Contents: 175 AE Epirus Koinon: 71 Ambracia: 104 (3 Apollo hd./obelisk, 1 Apollo hd./tripod, 100 Dione hd./ obelisk) Disposition: dispersed Franke, Epirus, pp. 323-32, illus. Possibly part of no. 308 below
